title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 14-4.31 - Definition of food processing establishment and commissary
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 14-4.31 - Definition of food processing establishment and commissary

State Regulations
(a) A food processing establishment is a commercial establishment operated under license or permit of an appropriate regulatory authority where food is manufactured or packaged for human consumption at another establishment or place. (b) A mobile food service establishment commissary is an establishment operated under license or permit of an appropriate regulatory authority where food is manufactured, stored, prepared, portioned or packaged, or any combination of these, where such food is intended for consumption at another establishment or place. It is also the place which is used as the base of operations for one or more mobile food service establishments or pushcarts, where such unit or units are serviced, cleaned, supplied, maintained, and where the equipment, utensils and facilities are serviced, cleaned and sanitized.
